snippet.title: Boreal Blade  - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Boreal Blade is a team-based melee fighting game with a focus on player vs player combat, combining reactionary and tactical gameplay with extraordinary freedom to variate your attacks and develop your unique fighting style.

Out today on Nintendo Switch with a free demo! 
https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/boreal-blade-switch/

NOTE: The demo and full game are compatible, allowing players of both versions play together!

Coming soon to Steam with Beta access available through our Discord server: https://discord.gg/borealblade

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/598780/Boreal_Blade

Official Website: https://www.borealblade.com
Twitter:https://www.twitter.com/borealblade
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/borealblade

Developed by Frozenbyte. Copyright © 2019 Frozenbyte Oy. "Boreal Blade" is a trademark or registered trademark of Frozenbyte Oy in the U.S. and other countries. All Rights Reserved.
